text: Vse eti znameniya dokazali, chto vash Bog, kotoromu vy dolzhny poklonyat'sya - Allakh Yedinyy, i net u Nego souchastnikov. No, nesmotrya na eto, te, kotoryye ne veruyut ni v voskreseniye, ni v Sudnyy den', otritsayut v svoikh serdtsakh yedinobozhiye. Ikh gordynya meshayet im idti pryamym putom istiny i poklonyat'sya Allakhu
